Header.title: Watch On
Header.paragraph: Smarter Surveillance, Enhanced Security. Revolutionize safety with advanced AI-powered monitoring, person recognition, and real-time insights.

About.paragraph: Modern society's security challenges require intelligent surveillance systems capable of efficiently monitoring and analyzing vast video data. This project is part of an effort to develop a comprehensive surveillance system integrating advanced technologies for enhanced security. It includes modules for person identification, age and gender prediction, and anomaly detection, creating a multilayered approach to monitoring. The person identification module combines face recognition and gait analysis, while the age and gender prediction module provides demographic insights. Anomaly detection flags unusual activities for potential security threats. This report focuses on the person path tracking analysis and change detection modules, essential for understanding movement patterns and identifying significant scene changes that could signal security risks.

Features.title: Face and Gait Recognition
Features.text: Implement face detection, recognition, and gait analysis models for person identification in surveillance footage, utilizing facial features and walking patterns. The system dynamically selects the identification method based on the quality of the available data.

Features.title: Predictive Age and Gender Recognition
Features.text: Develop models to accurately detect age and reliably identify gender from surveillance footage. The web application processes uploaded videos and displays the predicted age and gender of individuals.

Features.title: Anomaly Detection
Features.text: Implement a system to detect anomalies in surveillance footage using both supervised and unsupervised learning models. The supervised model identifies predefined anomalies like weapons, fire, or hidden faces, while the unsupervised model detects rare, previously unseen anomalies.

Features.title: Path tracking & Change Detection
Features.text: Implement a system to detect people and objects, analyze their movements, and generate movement analysis. The system also triggers alerts based on detected movement patterns.
